articles.title: Zachary Leener Poster
articles.copy: Designed some stuffy 80's style upper west-side exhibition posters for Zachary Leener's upcoming exhibit The Woronowii Editions at TIF SIGFRIDS!

articles.title: CHRIS CUNNINHAM STUDIO
articles.copy: Very excited to provide Chris Cunningham Studio with development consulting on the initial launch of their new web presence. Get psyched on this teaser of myriad projects this hyper influential director has been working on!
